{

{

}
}

<js>

result3=String(str3.match(reg1)).replace(/href="(.+?)".*?>(.+?)作品集<\/a>,?/gi,"\[武侠\]$2::$1&&");
result4=String(str4.match(reg1)).replace(/href="(.+?)".*?>(.+?)作品集<\/a>,?/gi,"\[言情\]$2::$1&&");
result=result1+result2+result3+result4;
</js>
